name: Asteroidz (Ol-Sellik)
description:
Start the game and start flying your ship right away. Survive as best as you can, dodging asteroids using your ship's abilities.

Shoot green rocks to increase your score multiplier. As it goes up, difficulty will also increase ! Whenever it gets too tough, you can always pop a magenta rock and blow everything back to normal !

Try and achieve the best score you can and post it below ! My PB is 27'604. If you try this game out, please feel free to share your thoughts, any feedback is welcome.

Beware, controls are purposely hard and although they may seen counter-intuitive to some people, but you'll get the hang of it! Glad to hear your feedback about controls, too.

This is my very first game and was made over a week or so.

Known issues:

- Game objects are supposed to wrap around screen when hitting borders. Sometimes, your ship can disappear and remain stuck out-of-bounds. If you encounter this issue, please tell me how it happened. I reckon it might happen when flying too slow around the screen borders.

- Game will not work properly for screens of ratio different than 16:9. I haven't bothered handling that issue for now and I apologize.
